When any character at your location attempts a check to acquire a spell or defeat a monster (or barrier), you may recharge a card to reduce the difficulty of that check by 1 plus the adventure deck number of the recharged card, if any.

When any character at your location attempts a check to acquire a spell or defeat a monster, you may recharge a card to reduce the difficulty of that check by (2) plus the adventure deck number of the recharged card, if any.

You may discard an ally that has the Animal trait to return a spell from your discard pile to your hand.
